summary:
Maybe we all liked Cyberpunk 2077 gameplay demo because it was in 1st person, hence the immersion and amazing gameplay.
If it...
body:
Maybe we all liked Cyberpunk 2077 gameplay demo because it was in 1st person, hence the immersion and amazing gameplay.

If it becomes 3rd person, wouldn’t it become a cover based open world thing.

Solution: one should be able to switch between 1st and 3rd person perspectives at will.

reblog.comment:
Maybe we all liked Cyberpunk 2077 gameplay demo because it was in 1st person, hence the immersion and amazing gameplay.

If it becomes 3rd person, wouldn’t it become a cover based open world thing.

Solution: one should be able to switch between 1st and 3rd person perspectives at will.

trail.content_raw:
Maybe we all liked Cyberpunk 2077 gameplay demo because it was in 1st person, hence the immersion and amazing gameplay.

If it becomes 3rd person, wouldn’t it become a cover based open world thing.

Solution: one should be able to switch between 1st and 3rd person perspectives at will.
trail.content:
Maybe we all liked Cyberpunk 2077 gameplay demo because it was in 1st person, hence the immersion and amazing gameplay.

If it becomes 3rd person, wouldn’t it become a cover based open world thing.

Solution: one should be able to switch between 1st and 3rd person perspectives at will.

title: Drops
body:
Godmode Podcast: Drops

Fala, galera!

Paulo, Pita, Chuvisco (de surpresa), Thiago e Rafael falam sobre as notícias da última semana, Gamescom, Cyberpunk 2077, Yoku’s Island Express, Odallus: The Dark Call, Prey, Overwatch, e muito mais.

Não se esqueçam de mandar suas sugestões de temas para Offmode para o nosso e-m@il, assinar o nosso canal de You Tube, contribuir com o nosso Patreon ou Apoia.se, se inscrever no grupo F…

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - Детали о системе напарников и покупке квартир
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Детали о системе напарников и покупке квартир
body: В переписке с поклонниками представители студии CD Projekt RED подтвердили, что в ролевой игре Cyberpunk 2077 будет представлена возможность покупать и разблокировать новые квартиры. В дебютной геймплейной демонстрации было показано лишь одно из возм… Читать дальше »

summary: Don’t be mean now. ‘Member, I’m old, I got a shaky, ‘ganic hand. Could slip.   I couldn’t find any gifs of our favourite...
caption:
Don’t be mean now. ‘Member, I’m old, I got a shaky, ‘ganic hand. Could slip.


I couldn’t find any gifs of our favourite Ripperdoc: Dr. Victor Vector, so here’s my attempt at a gif post. Hopefully the quality won’t turn out to be too garbage

summary: I’m not sorry for all the Cyberpunk 2077 I’m reblogging lately
body:
I’m not sorry for all the Cyberpunk 2077 I’m reblogging lately

If you follow me, this is just your life now. That said, if any of y’all are looking forward to it or want to know about it, send me a chat or ask so I can talk your ear off about it

summary: I’m actually really excited for Cyberpunk!! I haven’t been this excited for a game in what feels like years. I just hope it’s as...
body: I’m actually really excited for Cyberpunk!! I haven’t been this excited for a game in what feels like years. I just hope it’s as good as it’s aiming to be. Regardless I’m sure I’ll still enjoy it to some extent.

reblog.comment: I’m actually really excited for Cyberpunk!! I haven’t been this excited for a game in what feels like years. I just hope it’s as good as it’s aiming to be. Regardless I’m sure I’ll still enjoy it to some extent.
